subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt crushed the world record in the 100 meters in theatrical fashion Saturday night at the Beijing Olympics with a time of 9.69 seconds.
snippet: Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt crushed the world record in the 100 meters in theatrical fashion Saturday night at the Beijing Olympics with a time of 9.69 seconds.
